byline: Molly Wood, David Weinberg and Chester Wisniewski
description: Apple releases its latest business results, and as usual, the news will be all about the iPhone. Apple's smartphone and iPad tablet are both, in tech years, practically geriatric. When it comes to the bottom line, Apple has traditionally done best when it innovates. So the question is, can the company deliver a new and revolutionary gadget? And, nearly half a billion mobile phone SIM cards might be vulnerable to hacking.

title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, July 23, 2013
